subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Early in the 14th stage of the Tour de France, a man threw urine at Froome and accused him of doping. Froome, the overall leader, has firmly denied such charges.
snippet: Early in the 14th stage of the Tour de France, a man threw urine at Froome and accused him of doping. Froome, the overall leader, has firmly denied such charges.
